Source.Name: libzita-convolver
Source.Summary: C++ library implementing a real-time convolution matrix.
Source.Description: Zita convolver is a C++ library implementing a real-time convolution matrix for up to 64 inputs and outputs. It uses multiple partition sizes to provide both low delay and efficient CPU use.

Package.Name: libzita-convolver

Package.Description: Zita convolver is a C++ library implementing a real-time convolution matrix for up to 64 inputs and outputs. It uses multiple partition sizes to provide both low delay and efficient CPU use.
